verbose_text: The controlled response between the PI3K / Akt signaling pathway and TLR4 has been also reported by Wang et al, who demonstrated that upregulation of miR-223 prevented the development of atherosclerosis by inhibiting TLR4 signaling via activation of the PI3K / Akt pathway.
evidence: miR-223 prevented the development of atherosclerosis by inhibiting TLR4
